test.name: Navigate To Report Page And Switch To Chinese

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Switch Language And Verify
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Click Element
kw.msg: Element with locator 'xpath=//div[contains(@class, 'dropdown-menu')]//a[contains(text(), '中文')]' not found.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.status: Element with locator 'xpath=//div[contains(@class, 'dropdown-menu')]//a[contains(text(), '中文')]' not found.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify Page Contains Multiple Texts
Get Source
kw.doc: Returns the entire HTML source of the current page or frame.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

iter.var: 过去五年内文章总数统计

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
